name: Putting the 'Dream' in Dreamliner - Thank You Air Canada Foundation ᴴᴰ
description:
This is the story of how Air Canada made one of my dreams come true in an unexpected and unforgettable way.

Special thank you to Micheline, Leslie-ann, Captain Perry, and all the other pilots and crew who made it an amazing experience.
____________________________________________________

Donate to the Air Canada Foundation now: https://www.canadahelps.org/dn/18319
More information about the Foundation: http://www.aircanada.com/en/about/com...
